# LayerRenderer.Drawable.Target

**Enumeration**

The target where the drawable will be displayed/used.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Target
```

## Overview

Use these constants to determine whether content should be drawn for certain targets.

## Enumeration Cases

- **LayerRenderer.Drawable.Target.builtIn**: A drawable that is targeting the built-in display, this is what a user will see in the device.
- **LayerRenderer.Drawable.Target.capture**: A drawable that will be used for capture purposes, this could be used for video or AirPlay streaming and will be visible to users outside of the device.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Retrieving the target

- **target**: Returns a value that indicates the target of the drawable type.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
